New Records: Greece secured a 3-0 victory over Finland in the UEFA Nations League Group B2 match on 7th September 2024.
Fostis Ioannidis scored a brace for Greece in the match.
Benjamin Kallman scored an own goal for Finland during the match.
Key Match Events: Benjamin Kallman scored an own goal for Finland.
Fostis Ioannidis scored a brace for Greece.
Greece maintained a clean sheet throughout the match.
